title: Ocasio-Cortez, Omar Backing Bernie Sanders for Democratic Nomination
text:
Rep. Ilhan Omar (D.,Minn) endorsed Sen. Bernie Sanders (I., Vt.) Tuesday night and Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (D., N.Y.) is expected to back him Saturday, a significant boost for the progressive senator, who has recently struggled for momentum in the presidential race.

“I have seen the values that motivate him and his commitment to building a movement that represents marginalized communities across this country,” Ms. Omar said in a press release Tuesday. “Bernie is leading a working-class movement to defeat Donald Trump that...
description: Rep. Ilhan Omar endorsed Sen. Bernie Sanders and Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez is expected to back him, a significant boost for the progressive senator, who has recently struggled for momentum in the presidential race.
